channel.title: How would u get something too call on another class
channel.description: im curious for my private server i want too break down some of the client chunks and put it into other classes for example i want all my commands in 1 class so i dont have too constantly scroll through the client.class mess anyone got any ideas how too get the client.class too call on the commands.class i made

item.title: How would u get something too call on another class
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.source: How would u get something too call on another class

item.title: How would u get something too call on another class
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

im curious for my private server i want too break down some of the client chunks and put it into other classes for example i want all my commands in 1 class so i dont have too constantly scroll through the client.class mess anyone got any ideas how too get the client.class too call on the commands.class i made

from client.java you could simply call functions or methods that are declared public and static like this:

commands.functionname();

that is assuming your other class is named commands

Read full topic
item.source: How would u get something too call on another class
